gt_text: あなたは遅れていない 今、向かっているところ 深呼吸して、笑って、前へ進もう もうすぐ着くよ
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required visual elements:

*   A bedroom mirror.
*   Multiple scattered sticky notes covering the mirror's surface (these general notes should be readable if they contain any text).
*   A top-left sticky note on the mirror displaying the legible Chinese text '你没有迟到'.
*   A middle sticky note on the mirror displaying the legible Chinese text '你正在路上'.
*   A bottom-right sticky note on the mirror displaying the legible Chinese text '深呼吸，微笑，继续前行'.
*   A single crumpled sticky note on the floor displaying the legible Chinese text '快到了'.
*   A floor surface.
